program: Master of Science in Data Science (SM)

sections.text: Harvard SEAS’s Data Science SM trains students to analyze, model, and visualize data at scale through rigorous coursework in computing and statistics.

items: 12 courses total; minimum 3 semesters on campus
Core/statistics selections (e.g., STAT 111/139/149/211/244 per degree requirements)
Computing courses such as AC 215, AM 215, or CS 2050 (per program list)
Option to extend for a fourth semester or a master’s thesis project
sections.text: Students complete 12 courses over at least three semesters, selecting from approved statistics and computing courses, with an option to extend or undertake thesis research.
